DescriptionData.Title: 'Mixed Bag' Layer Cake From Moda: Precut 10' Squares
DescriptionData.Description:
Imagine all your scrap bin favorites perfectly coordinated in a bold, playful array of colors and you’ve got a Mixed Bag of the latest must-have modern essentials. Available plain or brushed cuddly soft, this collection is versatile and ready to mix up some fun! 

Layer cakes contain 42 prints from the same collection and each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

For full details of this collection please see here

DescriptionData.Title: 'Autumn Woods' Layer Cake From Moda: Precut 10' Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Layer cakes contain 42 prints from the Autumn Woods collection and each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"
